topic.title: World is in an energy crisis
topic.body: Oil is running out. Think why they eliminated airlines and tourism. There will be no more wasting of oil. Covid is just distraction

1610487411_1Etm6vDz6ED5oGHsXGFpCDb3PNw8s.body:
> [zmei](#comment_5_12eVhxNAYFPJi5rUnbHwbmKPnqAniJs7SA): We will have far more efficient sources of electricity before we even get close to running out of oil. Trust me. Even if oil was seriously going to run out, it would make the economic incentive for new energy sources so tremendous that we'd see amazing innovations in energy production. We already have nuclear power and electromagnetic engines anyway, we could run out of oil this decade and handle it just fine, but we won't run out.

Im afraid its not so easy. Uranium is running out as well...
